amendment.description: Amendment prohibits allocation of funds to implement three executive orders and several other provisions of law that require the military to invest in green energy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for compliance with various renewable energy mandates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. McClintock.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
